ygData.subject: Re: Writs and Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m given to understand that Identify Object spell may fix this, tho i cant say thru personal experience. There is also a faded map that can be found at
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Dan Swartzlander <dan@...>
>
> I recieved a faded writ called "A Faded Salil's Writ" I was
>wondering what it is used for and who uses it. Anyone know?
>
> Lanax (Fennin Ro)


I'm given to understand that "Identify Object" spell may fix this, tho i
cant say thru personal experience. There is also a faded map that can be
found at the cat isle between qey and Eru .. but was told the map was part
of a quest. Perhaps i'll make a trip back there, get it, and see if Identify
does anything.

It was mentioned earlier that runes where tough to find. So far the best
place I've gone for lower levels to find these things soloing is the
scarecrows. However, there are only a few of them and if many people camp
the fields it's next to impossible to find them cause they dont loot runes,
words, and pages all that often. In my experience Words were most often
looted, followed by pages, and then runes, but with the rarity of finding
these, it's possible that my findings where just random and may not be
valid.

And finaly a question was raised about which classes uses what. As far as i
can understand, Runes go to Wizards, Words go to Necro's, and pages go to
Enchanters. Someone please step forward and correct me if I'm wrong.
